headline.print_headline: Bayless Spurs Grizzlies to 99-91 Win Over Suns
headline.main: Bayless Spurs Grizzlies to 99-91 Win Over Suns

docs.snippet: Jerryd Bayless scored 13 of his 17 points in the fourth quarter, coming off the bench to help the Memphis Grizzlies overcome Goran Dragic's 33 points in a 99-91 win over the Phoenix Suns on Thursday night....
docs.lead_paragraph: Jerryd Bayless scored 13 of his 17 points in the fourth quarter, coming off the bench to help the Memphis Grizzlies overcome Goran Dragic's 33 points in a 99-91 win over the Phoenix Suns on Thursday night.

headline.print_headline: Horton Scores in Debut, Jackets Blank Coyotes 2-0
headline.main: Horton Scores in Debut, Jackets Blank Coyotes 2-0

docs.snippet: Nathan Horton scored in his Columbus debut, Curtis McElhinney made 34 saves for his second shutout of the season, and the Blue Jackets beat the sluggish Phoenix Coyotes 2-0 on Thursday night....
docs.lead_paragraph: Nathan Horton scored in his Columbus debut, Curtis McElhinney made 34 saves for his second shutout of the season, and the Blue Jackets beat the sluggish Phoenix Coyotes 2-0 on Thursday night.

headline.print_headline: Eller Scores in 3rd, Canadiens Beat Stars 6-4
headline.main: Eller Scores in 3rd, Canadiens Beat Stars 6-4

docs.snippet: Lars Eller broke a tie midway through the third period, Max Pacioretty had two goals and two assists, and the Montreal Canadiens beat the Dallas Stars 6-4 on Thursday night....
docs.lead_paragraph: Lars Eller broke a tie midway through the third period, Max Pacioretty had two goals and two assists, and the Montreal Canadiens beat the Dallas Stars 6-4 on Thursday night.

headline.print_headline: Lister Leads Vanderbilt Over No. 19 Georgia 66-58
headline.main: Lister Leads Vanderbilt Over No. 19 Georgia 66-58

docs.snippet: Jasmine Lister scored 24 points and the Vanderbilt defense smothered No. 19 Georgia's top scorers to earn a 66-58 win in the Southeastern Conference opener Thursday night....
docs.lead_paragraph: Jasmine Lister scored 24 points and the Vanderbilt defense smothered No. 19 Georgia's top scorers to earn a 66-58 win in the Southeastern Conference opener Thursday night.

headline.print_headline: Hayward, Favors Lead Jazz Over Bucks 96-87
headline.main: Hayward, Favors Lead Jazz Over Bucks 96-87

docs.snippet: Gordon Hayward scored 22 points and Derrick Favors had 21 points and 11 rebounds to help the Utah Jazz hold off the Milwaukee Bucks 96-87 Thursday night and claim consecutive wins for just the third time this season....
docs.lead_paragraph: Gordon Hayward scored 22 points and Derrick Favors had 21 points and 11 rebounds to help the Utah Jazz hold off the Milwaukee Bucks 96-87 Thursday night and claim consecutive wins for just the third time this season.

docs.snippet: Carmelo Anthony's presence in the lineup has a way of making things right for the Knicks....
docs.lead_paragraph: Carmelo Anthony's presence in the lineup has a way of making things right for the Knicks.

headline.print_headline: Judge Blocks Stripping Largest California Community College of Accreditation
headline.main: Judge Blocks Stripping Largest California Community College of Accreditation

docs.snippet: California's largest community college won a reprieve on Thursday when a judge temporarily blocked a regulatory agency from stripping City College of San Francisco of its accreditation....
docs.lead_paragraph: California's largest community college won a reprieve on Thursday when a judge temporarily blocked a regulatory agency from stripping City College of San Francisco of its accreditation.

docs.snippet: Rachel Theriot hit the go-ahead jumper with 1:39 remaining, and finished with 19 points, eight assists and six rebounds to help No. 18 Nebraska outlast Northwestern 66-65 in a Big 10 Conference opener for both teams Thursday night....
docs.lead_paragraph: Rachel Theriot hit the go-ahead jumper with 1:39 remaining, and finished with 19 points, eight assists and six rebounds to help No. 18 Nebraska outlast Northwestern 66-65 in a Big 10 Conference opener for both teams Thursday night.

docs.snippet: Przemek Karnowski had 15 points and nine rebounds and No. 24 Gonzaga beat archrival Saint Mary's 73-51 on Thursday night....
docs.lead_paragraph: Przemek Karnowski had 15 points and nine rebounds and No. 24 Gonzaga beat archrival Saint Mary's 73-51 on Thursday night.

headline.print_headline: Hughes Fined by FA Over Touchline Tantrum
headline.main: Hughes Fined by FA Over Touchline Tantrum

docs.snippet: Stoke City manager Mark Hughes has been fined 8,000 pounds by the Football Association after a coat-throwing touchline tantrum during his side's 5-1 English Premier League defeat at Newcastle United....
docs.lead_paragraph: Stoke City manager Mark Hughes has been fined 8,000 pounds by the Football Association after a coat-throwing touchline tantrum during his side's 5-1 English Premier League defeat at Newcastle United.
